p: The levels of each factor are given in Table 1. Twenty-seven experiments were carried out from the design ( Table 2). The results of the second-order response surface model fitting for extraction yield in the form of analysis of variance (ANOVA) are given in Table 3. To test the fit of the model, the regression equation and determination coefficient R 2 were evaluated. The model presented a high determination coefficient ( R 2 = 0.976) explaining 97.6% of the variability in the response ( Table 3). The coefficients of regression were calculated and the following regression equation ( 4) was obtained.
